content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *marni is a crocheted draw string shoulder bag berroco * skill level easy materials berroco zen 50 grs 1 ball each #8256 dragonfly a and #8269 samsura b berroco idol 50 grs 1 ball each #1505 liz c and #1556 paris d crochet hook size 9 00 mm m or size to obtain gauge gauge 10 single_crochet = 4 9 rnds = 4 in single_crochet worked tbl with 1 strand each of zen and idol held decrease using size 9 00 m crochet hook all rounds are worked tbl both yarns held together bag body is worked in the round in one piece handles are worked separately and sewn on
